Html:
Using the new Compile on Save feature in 0.8.2, is it possible to have Visual Studio generate AMD modules equivalent to using the "--modules AMD" compiler option?

I've edited the project file and all I see are properties for TypeScriptTarget, TypeScriptIncludeComments and TypeScriptSourceMap.
I haven't tried it, but I bet you can follow https://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Compile-on-Save but use <TypeScriptModuleKind>AMD</TypeScriptModuleKind>.

Thanks cretz, I added <TypeScriptModuleKind>AMD</TypeScriptModuleKind> as you suggested.  This causes visual studio to output the correct AMD modules when I build the project, but still outputs non-amd javascript when it compiles on save.   Looks like it may be a bug in the compile on save feature.
